name: Dream Gazer
description:
Dream Gazer is a 2d platformer where the player progresses by solving puzzles and gaining new psychic abilities. Lucy wakes up and finds herself in a strange place. By going to sleep and dreaming she is able to unlock psychic powers. In her dreams, Lucy must destroy Psygates to access her psychic powers in reality and use them to explore.

Made for Let's Create Jam #2.

Richard Daskas - Programming, Music, Sound, Art

Jason Childers - Art, Sound

_______________________________________________________

Dream_Gazer_v1.1 (Post_GameJam)

  • Many game-breaking bugs are fixed.
  • Movement and jump have been tweaked. Player jump works all the time.
  • More sounds added.
  • Sound effects balanced.
  • In-game menu added.
